TopicTitle: Endless Cheat To Get More Planets In KSP

Articles.Content:
Inspired by a forum game on a forum that i used to enjoy.

HOW TO PLAY:

PLAYER 1: To get more planets in KSP, you must..

PLAYER 2: Probe Jebediah's brain to remove the thought of adding more boosters and..

PLAYER 3: Replace it with the thought of adding less boosters, but to do this, you must...

PLAYER 4: Get the R&D facility open in sandbox mode.

RULES:

1. Only one or two sentences allowed in a post!

2. No double posting, but you can post again after someone posts.

I'll start.

To get more planets in KSP, you must..
awaken the deep space kraken in version 0.18
And then you need to make a potion to make Kerbals giant using...
The great and powerful monolith of power and sacrifice...
The ferocious, the bug-eyed Billkerman, and consult the Bob-Tron 500 and it'll say...
But then; the Bob-Tron 500 explodes, and it is due to a cooking show called...
Kerfry! Then, a 60km asteroid destroys Kerbin, or at least knocks it into the Sun.
But then Jeb goes back in time to stop it in his tardis, when suddenly...
The Doctor come back and retrieve his tardis, so you must...
dunk them in milk, enjoy them, sit back and relax, THEN...
Explode a bunch of fireworks using only a letter opener. After that is done...
I will appear on a purple unicorn and...
Explode, then you must shake hands with the Kraken and...
Promptly die from exposure to the Kraken, and when you are reborn...
within kerbol where you will rule with an...
Kerbal, but the Kerbal gets agitated and says..
